summary: Core architecture built in one session. Server boots clean, API tested, codebase scanner works. UI built but never rendered in browser. 79 source files. Needs browser testing, then real-world usage.

systems.name: Server (Hono API)
systems.notes: Boots clean on port 24680. 16 route files. All endpoints return expected JSON. WebSocket working. File watcher working. Script runner untested.

systems.name: Web UI (React + Tailwind)
systems.notes: 11 views built (Dashboard, Backlog, Actions, Issues, Ideas, Codebase, Sessions, Changelog, Docs, Metrics, Settings). Dark theme configured. NEVER TESTED IN BROWSER. This is the critical gap.

systems.name: CLI
systems.notes: All commands defined. Tested indirectly via API calls. Needs real usage testing.

systems.name: Data Layer (JSON + TypeScript)
systems.notes: All schemas defined in shared/types.ts. All files read/write correctly. File watcher syncs changes. Store singleton pattern working.

systems.name: Integration Plugins
systems.notes: 8 plugins: GitHub, Vercel, Supabase, Sentry, Helicone, Upstash, AWS EC2, Cloudflare. All have setup guides and credential fields. None tested with real API keys.

systems.name: AI Brain System
systems.notes: Notes, preferences, context recovery all have API routes. Brain note creation tested and working. Context recovery populated from this session.

systems.name: Codebase Scanner
systems.notes: Scanned Pillar (664 files, 139K lines) in 289ms. Extracts functions, components, API routes, pages, imports, external calls, DB operations. Search working.

systems.name: Ideas System
systems.notes: Full CRUD with status workflow. 7 ideas captured from initial conversation. Promote-to-backlog flow defined.

systems.name: Cross-Platform Context Sync
systems.notes: Engine written for Cursor, Claude, Copilot, Windsurf, generic. Never tested. Not wired to any CLI command or API route yet.

systems.name: Cursor Rule Template
systems.notes: Template written with triggers, file map, AI brain instructions, autonomy permissions, self-tuning rules. Not yet validated in a real session.

must_have.item: UI renders in browser without errors
All 11 views load and display data
WebSocket live updates working in UI
At least one integration tested with real credentials

important.item: Context sync generates correct platform files
Self-tracking (this project) used for a real session
